name: Needles (blex)
description:
In Needles, you play as a Potted Cactus whose goal is to return to the desert. You must use the environment around you (and your spikes) in creative ways in order to progress.

Controls (Keyboard):

  • X - toggle spikes
  • C - jump
  • arrow keys to move
  • keybindings can be changed

Controls (Xbox360 and most controllers):

  • West button - toggle spikes
  • South button - jump
  • Left joystick to move
  • controls cannot be changed and must be turned on in the controls menu

The Team:

  • Cameron Schiff (Lead, Game Designer)
